website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas World Cup steals the show with its classic look and superb engineering. Players love its protective build that definitely doesn’t come short on comfort. They also attest to the fine quality of its leather upper that hugs snugly around the foot. However, wearers did notice that sizing runs about half a size smaller than most cleats. Some also had issues with the cleat’s durability. Overall, amidst its minor flaws, this release from Adidas proves to be one excellent cleat that performs well on the soft ground pitch.
pros: Based on a good number of reviews, the Adidas World Cup is a protective and strong cleat
A particular user said that the leather almost molds around the foot for an extremely comfortable fit
Many users love the great look and classic design of this Adidas cleat
These soft ground soccer cleats feel very comfortable on foot, according to several testers
Some players who tried this soccer cleat appreciated the long laces, saying it gave added support for the feet
The overall look of this soccer cleat is reminiscent of the Adidas Samba Classic
cons: A significant number of users have observed that the Adidas World Cup has a smaller fit compared to other Adidas soccer cleats
A particular wearer was dismayed when the plastic sole started to come away from the leather after a couple of uses
According to some users, the insole of the Adidas World Cup  is very thin
they can feel the studs sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but way too small
customer_reviews.text: I have copa mondials in a 9.5 which have tonnes of room, if anything a bit big, so bought the same in these expecting SG boots to maybe come up a bit smaller. Even allowing for stretch, the boots were simply way too small. My toes was pushing at the very end, while sitting down, and with thin (not football) socks on. I don't even think a 10 would have fit. Am really surprised as this is the 3rd different pair of boots this has been the case with.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Strachan

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Weak in-sole and the back stud snapped clean off, on WET GRASS, they’re obviously cheap because of the build not being as good the ones direct from Adidas.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Not much different from the ones I wore in my teens. Well made, protective, classic look and feel. I’d order a half size bigger though, he’ll be lucky to see out the summer in them.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The World Cup football boots are very good, however, the box they were packaged in was far too small and there was no packaging inside the boots so they were quite squashed. There was no spanner for tightening/loosening the studs. Poor for such a quality product

customer_reviews.title: Adidas World Cup Soft Ground football boots. Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased boot for my 16 year old son which, he chose as he required a quality leather football boot for the forthcoming season. The boots fit like gloves giving a good foot to ball feel. Made in the Classic Adidas Black design, means that they can be worn with any colour football kit. Great value for money, quality stitching and good adhesion of sole plate to upper leather. Well below the price of some brands of similar standing.
customer_reviews.author: G B

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's World Cup Football Boots
product_meta.description: The Adidas World Cup is one of Adidas greatest soccer shoes made of rich kangaroo leather. The perfect fitting and the outsoles with studs are made for training on especially soft grounds.
